channel.title: [Scratch PI]634 Items | Compressed 602 Npcs | 602 Anims | Summoning | Curses[PI]
channel.description:
Server Features: - Hand cannon - Miasmic barrage - Decent magic system - Decent Melee system - Summoning - Report System - Bank pin system - Starter Interface - New korasi special + Magic attack - All Dupes known fixed; any found let me know :) - Recipe for disaster - Clan chat system - Tormented Demons (No teleport added do it yourself if you want)
Skills: - Firemaking - Cooking - Crafting + Flax Spinning - Fishing All fish are fishable Including rocktails. - Runecrafting - Theiving - Slayer - Summoning - Mining - Smithing - Herblore - Fletching - Woodcutting - Prayer - Agility - Hunter
Minigames: - Pest control - Fight pits (100% Working) - Barrows (Tunnels) - 63 Wave jad (No bugs, No logging out for wave to start)
Bosses - Sea troll - Corporal Beast - King black dragon - Chaos elemental
Quests: - Desert Treasure - Cook's Assistant - Lost City - Save the desert (My own custom quest^^)
Client Features: - Custom Cursors (Interfaces/eat/normal magics/ancient magics/lunar magics lots more) - All Orbs working correctly - Lots of unique interfaces - New logout button + advisor - World map orb + opens world map - 634 Items - 602 Npc's - 602 Animations + Gfx - 633 Characters - New emotes tab working 100% - My own unique skill interface
Can't remember Anymore theres heaps more though for client and serverside.
You must Download the cache from here the auto download one is wrong!
Download Links: [url=http://uppit.com/mjfp5mbv3nrv/DreamscapeV14.rar]Download DreamscapeV14.rar @ UppIT[/url] CACHE [url=http://uppit.com/ll1044avj64u/Dreamscape_Server_Download_3.rar]Download Dreamscape.Server.Download.rar @ UppIT[/url] Server and Client
Download Mirrors: http://www.mediafire.com/?ddgnfruedh6a2eg CACHE
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?80bip0k8khmye9l Server and Client
Credits: 'Cody (Loading screen from recoil rift, + a few interfaces) And myself whoever else had anything to do with this. Revil
Why this is original?
For once It's nothing related to DSPK, It's pretty much like DSPK just a hell of alot more stable and a reliable server hence the good content.
MEDIA: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1674cwo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/zwhimq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/mmrex5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vg3jmo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/wlu0ys.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/11uyl4j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/52m3ag.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/rliddi.png[/img]
Server/client [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2w3aqfs.png[/img] Cache [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/fmopk7.png[/img]
Note: This is not endura V3 or w.e. It's called, this was originally a completely scratch PI Client/Source..
